about_the_game: Legend of the 9 Swords: Side Story is a 2-Dimensional illustrated role-playing game that is an introduction to the characters and abilities from the full game. In the Side Story you join Neyru, Rethis, Shi'ar and Chathien as they hunt the inter-dimensional criminal Kast. This fantasy RPG has each frame hand animated to emphasize the style of the characters and bring Team tactic role-playing battle to life beyond super-deformed or icon driven battles. The side story is representative of the final game that we seek to finish and we hope you see what we have always loved. A great story.
detailed_description: Legend of the 9 Swords: Side Story is a 2-Dimensional illustrated role-playing game that is an introduction to the characters and abilities from the full game. In the Side Story you join Neyru, Rethis, Shi'ar and Chathien as they hunt the inter-dimensional criminal Kast. This fantasy RPG has each frame hand animated to emphasize the style of the characters and bring Team tactic role-playing battle to life beyond super-deformed or icon driven battles. The side story is representative of the final game that we seek to finish and we hope you see what we have always loved. A great story.
legal_notice: Legend of the 9 Swords is copyright by Christopher Rodrigues.  Music and assets are used under permission from RPG Maker MV.  Plugins used are with permissions from Yanlfly.moe and Orange Overlay. Story inspired by the events of a Role-playing Campaign affectionately called "the Swords Game." Credit to Taylor Bolton-Gearhart for writing and running such a massive and immense campaign. All rights reserved.

short_description: Legend of the 9 Swords: Side Story is a 2-Dimensional illustrated narrative role-playing game that is hand animated to give every hero and enemy there own style and feel.
